thread.title: Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: A great company to do business with. I've made four transactions so far with no issues. I love to read and over time the books pile up. I was elated to be able to sell my books and DVDs for some extra cash. This is a better option than letting your books and DVDs sit around gathering dust or throwing them away during spring cleaning. This company has my future business.
